LanguageData.CSP.resetall.label: Manual config reset
LanguageData.CSP.resetall.confirm: This will reset ALL values to vanilla values for all stuff
LanguageData.CSP.resetone.confirm: This will reset the values for {0} to vanilla values
LanguageData.CSP.logging.label: Enable verbose logging
LanguageData.CSP.logging.tooltip: Shows verbose logging, for finding errors
LanguageData.CSP.version.label: Installed mod-version: {0}
LanguageData.CSP.commonality.tooltip: How often this stuff is chosen when generating items
